        public void customizeGalleryView(android.view.View gv)
        Description copied from class: ImageGalleryBaseAdapter
        Customizes image gallery view elements (e.g., visibility, click handlers) as needed by the adapter. (The gallery view's icon and title will have already been set.)
        Specified by:
        customizeGalleryView in class ImageGalleryBaseAdapter
        Parameters:
        gv - The image gallery view.

      • customizeToolbarView

        public void customizeToolbarView(android.view.View tbv)
        Description copied from class: ImageGalleryBaseAdapter
        Customizes image gallery toolbar view elements (e.g., visibility, click handlers) as needed by the adapter. (The toolbar's image details and full screen buttons will have already had their click handlers set.)
        Specified by:
        customizeToolbarView in class ImageGalleryBaseAdapter
        Parameters:
        tbv - The image gallery's toolbar view.

      • getDropDownStateListener

        public DropDown.OnStateListener getDropDownStateListener()
        Specified by:
        getDropDownStateListener in class ImageGalleryBaseAdapter
        Returns:
        The adapter's OnStateListener for the image gallery DropDown, or null if the adapter doesn't need to track modifications to the state of the DropDown. (The appearance/disappearance of the image gallery toolbar is handled by the caller after invoking this listener.)

        Parameters:
